item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, April 25, 2025 at 7:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple aims to source all US iPhones from India in pivot away from China
2. Child abuse scandal engulfs French prime minister
3. Trump claims to have received call from Xi and to have cut ‘200 deals’ on trade
4. Trump Organization signals it will fire lawyer over work for Harvard
5. Milei taunts economists as Argentina’s peso defies predictions of sharp fall
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, April 25, 2025 at 7:15 PM UTC
